name: Save that small planet
description:
Save that small planet is a game where you protect the planet from the meteor shower using a satellite that shoot laser beams.
Made for Ludum Dare 38, theme: " A Small World"
Ludum Dare page

Instructions:
- Protect the planet from the meteors

Controls:
- A and D (or left and right arrow) to move left and right.
- Left mouse button (or space) to shoot.

Made in Unity3D. Sprites done in Gimp and Paint.net. Sounds done in Bfxr.
